name: CODING_CLA_EVI_DOC_CSN_ID
description: The documentation CSN where evidence came from.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the note record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: EVIDENCE_NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The CSN of the document that support the suggestion of the query.
